A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I found this one ok\, but expected better. The film does stretch on a bit and the rose character and story ark was not great. I'm glad they decided to do more with the force use in this. It is a bit of a risk \, but a risk i think pays off and there's quite a few really good scene's i enjoyed . However there's quite a few plot hole's and decisions in this that annoyed me.
